org.apache.ignite.ml.trees

Interface ContinuousSplitCalculator<C extends ContinuousRegionInfo>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - Class in which information about region will be stored.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiniSplitCalculator, VarianceSplitCalculator

    public interface ContinuousSplitCalculator<C extends ContinuousRegionInfo>
    This class is used for calculation of best split by continuous feature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C calculateRegionInfo(DoubleStream s, int l)
      Calculate region info 'from scratch'.
      SplitInfo<C> splitRegion(Integer[] sampleIndexes, double[] values, double[] labels, int regionIdx, C data)
      Calculate split info of best split of region given information about this region.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateRegionInfo

        C calculateRegionInfo(DoubleStream s,
                      int l)
        Calculate region info 'from scratch'.
        Parameters:
        s - Stream of labels in this region.
        l - Index of sample projection on this feature in array sorted by this projection value and intervals bitsets. (ContinuousFeatureProcessor).
        Returns:
        Region info.

      • splitRegion

        SplitInfo<C> splitRegion(Integer[] sampleIndexes,
                         double[] values,
                         double[] labels,
                         int regionIdx,
                         C data)
        Calculate split info of best split of region given information about this region.
        Parameters:
        sampleIndexes - Indexes of samples of this region.
        values - All values of this feature.
        labels - All labels of this feature.
        regionIdx - Index of region being split.
        data - Information about region being split which can be used for computations.
        Returns:
        Information about best split of region with index given by regionIdx.
